Game.Name: Pokemon Snakewood
Game.Plot: Pokemon Snakewood is a great Pokemon Hack for those who want to play a Hack with awesome Fakemon. This hack is the first hack of Cutlerine but with things he did, do you think it is just his first project? He is truly genius, he has learned by doing and worked very very hard. He started this project in 2010 and released the Final Version in 2013. The graphics are darker than usual Pokemon games so it makes Pokemon Snakewood is a zombie-styled game. Almost sprites and tiles are based on Pokemon Ruby but some sprites are drawn by the author. It is really worth to give it a try, especially night time. You wake up in Littleroot town which is not your usual town. You can not remember everything and why you were there. You gradually realize that Hoenn was attacked and invaded by an army of zombies. With helping from Professor Birch, you make a journey to find your memory and solve all problems which are happening to your region. You need to find the answer for the question “Who stands behind this?”. The prize for you is to be the new Champion of Hoenn. You will find out more informations when you try Pokemon Snakewood.
